title: Track Awesome Tmux Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Tmux (rothgar/awesome-tmux) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A list of awesome resources for tmux

items.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Jul 15, 2025
items.content_text:
### Tools and session management

*   [tmux-cookie-cutter (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/AranBorkum/tmux-cookie-cutter) A YAML based session builder, configuring windows, panes and environments automatically

### Plugins

*   [back-in-5 (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/hamolicious/back-in-5) display a "Back soon" message for remote collaboration
items.content_html:
Tools and session management

  • tmux-cookie-cutter (‚≠ê6) A YAML based session builder, configuring windows, panes and environments automatically

Plugins

  • back-in-5 (‚≠ê0) display a "Back soon" message for remote collaboration

items.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Mar 10, 2025
items.content_text:
### Status Bar

*   [tmux-current-pane-hostname (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/tony-sol/tmux-current-pane-hostname) Show current user and hostname in ssh sessions
*   [tmux-kubectx (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/tony-sol/tmux-kubectx) Show kubernetes context in statusbar
items.content_html:

  • tmux-kubectx (‚≠ê4) Show kubernetes context in statusbar

items.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Oct 16, 2024
items.content_text:
### Tools and session management

*   [tmux-tea (‚≠ê57)](https://github.com/2KAbhishek/tmux-tea) Session manager with previews, integrations with tmuxinator, fzf, neovim and more.

### Status Bar

*   [tmux2k (‚≠ê276)](https://github.com/2KAbhishek/tmux2k) Highly customizable tmux status bar framework, providing you with a sleek and informative status bar.

### Plugins

*   [tmux-tilit (‚≠ê48)](https://github.com/2KAbhishek/tmux-tilit) Brings tiling window manager features and intuitive keybindings to your tmux workflow.
items.content_html:
Tools and session management

  • tmux-tea (‚≠ê57) Session manager with previews, integrations with tmuxinator, fzf, neovim and more.

Status Bar

  • tmux2k (‚≠ê276) Highly customizable tmux status bar framework, providing you with a sleek and informative status bar.

Plugins

  • tmux-tilit (‚≠ê48) Brings tiling window manager features and intuitive keybindings to your tmux workflow.

items.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Aug 03, 2023
items.content_text:
### Themes

*   [tmux-base16-statusline (‚≠ê28)](https://github.com/jatap/tmux-base16-statusline) Statusline based on [base16-shell (‚≠ê253)](https://github.com/chriskempson/base16-shell)
*   [tmux-colors-solarized (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/seebi/tmux-colors-solarized) A color theme for the tmux terminal multiplexer using Ethan Schoonover‚Äôs Solarized color scheme
*   [tmux-dark-notify (‚≠ê67)](https://github.com/erikw/tmux-dark-notify) - Make tmux's theme follow macOS dark/light mode.
*   [tmux-power (‚≠ê618)](https://github.com/wfxr/tmux-power) 8 powerline style themes for tmux, easily to expand.
*   [tmux-snazzy (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/ivnvxd/tmux-snazzy) Elegant tmux theme with bright colors
*   [tmux-themepack (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/jimeh/tmux-themepack) Various themes for tmux
*   [tokyo-night-tmux (‚≠ê455)](https://github.com/janoamaral/tokyo-night-tmux) tokyo-night theme for tmux
*   [tomorrow (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/edouard-lopez/tmux-tomorrow/): 5 flavors of Tomorrow theme based on specifications from [Tomorrow Theme (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/chriskempson/tomorrow-theme) (*i.e.* *dark*/*blue* and *light*).
items.content_html:
Themes

  • tmux-base16-statusline (‚≠ê28) Statusline based on base16-shell (‚≠ê253)
  • tmux-colors-solarized (‚≠ê1.1k) A color theme for the tmux terminal multiplexer using Ethan Schoonover‚Äôs Solarized color scheme
  • tmux-dark-notify (‚≠ê67) - Make tmux's theme follow macOS dark/light mode.
  • tmux-power (‚≠ê618) 8 powerline style themes for tmux, easily to expand.
  • tmux-snazzy (‚≠ê18) Elegant tmux theme with bright colors
  • tmux-themepack (‚≠ê1.7k) Various themes for tmux
  • tokyo-night-tmux (‚≠ê455) tokyo-night theme for tmux
  • tomorrow (‚≠ê47): 5 flavors of Tomorrow theme based on specifications from Tomorrow Theme (‚≠ê14k) (i.e. dark/blue and light).

items.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Nov 17, 2022
items.content_text:
### Tools and session management

*   [tmux-powerline (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/erikw/tmux-powerline) A hackable statusbar for tmux consisting of dynamic & beautiful looking segments, inspired by vim-powerline, written purely in bash.

### Status Bar

*   [tmux-ludanta (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/vascomfnunes/tmux-ludanta) - What's playing
    on an MPD local server.
*   [tmux-network-bandwidth (‚≠ê81)](https://github.com/xamut/tmux-network-bandwidth) Show
    network bandwidth
*   [tmux-plugin-playerctl (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/richin13/tmux-plugin-playerctl) Display [MPRIS](https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Specifications/mpris-spec/) metadata in Tmux (Spotify, Clementine, VLC, etc)
items.content_html:
Tools and session management

  • tmux-powerline (‚≠ê3.6k) A hackable statusbar for tmux consisting of dynamic & beautiful looking segments, inspired by vim-powerline, written purely in bash.

Status Bar

items.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Jan 20, 2021
items.content_text:
### Tutorials

*   [Tmux crash course](https://thoughtbot.com/blog/a-tmux-crash-course)
*   [Tmux and Vim together](https://www.bugsnag.com/blog/tmux-and-vim)

### Configuration

*   [Guide to customizing tmux.conf](https://www.hamvocke.com/blog/a-guide-to-customizing-your-tmux-conf/)
*   [tmux yank to system clipboard](https://www.grailbox.com/2020/08/use-system-clipboard-for-vi-copy-mode-in-tmux-in-macos-and-linux/) A way to get the System Clipboard to work with tmux yank on a Mac via `pbcopy` and linux via `xclip`

### Tools and session management

*   [libtmux (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/tmux-python/libtmux) Python API for tmux
*   [teamocil (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/remi/teamocil) A simple tool used to automatically create windows and panes in tmux with YAML files
*   [tmuxp (‚≠ê4.2k)](https://github.com/tmux-python/tmuxp) :computer: tmux session manager and python library

### Books / Development and testing

*   [tmux 2: Productive Mouse-Free Development](https://pragprog.com/book/bhtmux2/tmux-2/)
items.content_html:
Tutorials

  • Tmux crash course
  • Tmux and Vim together

Configuration

  • Guide to customizing tmux.conf
  • tmux yank to system clipboard A way to get the System Clipboard to work with tmux yank on a Mac via pbcopy and linux via xclip

Tools and session management

  • libtmux (‚≠ê1.1k) Python API for tmux
  • teamocil (‚≠ê2.4k) A simple tool used to automatically create windows and panes in tmux with YAML files
  • tmuxp (‚≠ê4.2k) üíª tmux session manager and python library

Books / Development and testing

  • tmux 2: Productive Mouse-Free Development

items.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Apr 04, 2016
items.content_text:
### Tutorials

*   [Automatically start tmux on SSH](http://marklodato.github.io/2013/10/31/autostart-tmux-on-ssh.html)
*   [Tmux primer](https://danielmiessler.com/study/tmux/)

### Cheat Sheets

*   [tmux-cheatsheet.markdown](https://gist.github.com/MohamedAlaa/2961058)

### Configuration

*   [Example tmux config (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/tony/tmux-config) :green\_book: Example tmux configuration - screen + vim key-bindings, system stat, cpu load bar
*   [practical tmux](https://mutelight.org/practical-tmux)
*   [tmux-extra (‚≠ê119)](https://github.com/brandur/tmux-extra) Configuration and scripts for sane Tmux default behavior

### Tools and session management

*   [powerline (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/powerline/powerline) Statusline plugin for vim, and provides statuslines and prompts for several other applications including tmux
*   [tmuxifier (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/jimeh/tmuxifier) Tmuxify your Tmux. Powerful session, window & pane management for Tmux.
*   [tmuxinator (‚≠ê13k)](https://github.com/tmuxinator/tmuxinator) Manage complex tmux sessions easily

### Plugins

*   [tmux2html (‚≠ê724)](https://github.com/tweekmonster/tmux2html) :cat2: Render full tmux windows or individual panes as HTML
*   [tmux-plugins](https://github.com/tmux-plugins) Official tmux plugins
    *   [tmux-continuum (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-continuum) Continuous saving of tmux environment. Automatic restore when tmux is started. Automatic tmux start when computer is turned on.
    *   [tmux-copycat (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-copycat) A plugin that enhances tmux search
    *   [tmux-fpp (‚≠ê321)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-fpp) Quickly open any path on your terminal window in your $EDITOR of choice!
    *   [tmux-logging (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-logging) Easy logging and screen capturing for Tmux.
    *   [tmux-open (‚≠ê666)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-open) Tmux key bindings for quick opening of a highlighted file or url
    *   [tmux-pain-control (‚≠ê792)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-pain-control) standard pane key-bindings for tmux
    *   [tmux-resurrect (‚≠ê12k)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-resurrect) Persists tmux environment across system restarts.
    *   [tmux-sessionist (‚≠ê437)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-sessionist) Lightweight tmux utils for manipulating sessions
    *   [tmux-sidebar (‚≠ê573)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-sidebar) A sidebar with the directory tree for the current path. Tries to make tmux more IDE like.
    *   [tmux-tpm (‚≠ê13k)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tpm) Tmux Plugin Manager
    *   [tmux-urlview (‚≠ê281)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-urlview) Quickly open any url on your terminal window! (No commits since 2016, see tmux-urlscan or tmux-fzf-url for a maintained alternative.)
    *   [tmux-yank (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-yank) Tmux plugin for copying to system clipboard. Works on OSX, Linux and Cygwin.

### Plugins / Development and testing

*   [tmux-example-plugin (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-example-plugin) Example Tmux plugin that actually demonstrates how to build plugins for Tmux
*   [tmux-test (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/tmux-test) A small framework for isolated testing of tmux plugins.

### Miscellaneous / Development and testing

*   [Statically linked tmux](https://gist.github.com/rothgar/719ef460efc214c8d222) Install new version without root access
*   [vim-tmux (‚≠ê336)](https://github.com/tmux-plugins/vim-tmux) vim plugin for tmux.conf

    • tmux-yank (‚≠ê2.9k) Tmux plugin for copying to system clipboard. Works on OSX, Linux and Cygwin.
